name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. David Edward ROGERS Jr., Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. David Edward ROGERS Jr., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 1999, the Order of the Superior Court is affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Randolph, 553 Pa. 224, 718 A.2d 1242 (1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Mark D. Greenwald, Allentown, for Commonwealth.
Richard J. Makoul, Allentown, for David Edward Rogers:
casebody.head_matter:
727 A.2d 1076
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. David Edward ROGERS Jr., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 27, 1998.
Decided March 25, 1999.
Mark D. Greenwald, Allentown, for Commonwealth.
Richard J. Makoul, Allentown, for David Edward Rogers:
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, JJ.
